title: Mayan and Aztec Civilizations of Mesoamerica

vocab.definition: The region including Mexico and Central America where ancient civilizations developed
An ancient civilization known for astronomy, mathematics, and calendar systems
An ancient civilization that built a powerful empire in central Mexico
The capital city of the Aztec Empire, built on a lake
A writing system using pictures and symbols, used by Maya

teachingNotes: Use maps to show Mesoamerican geography. Compare Mayan and Aztec achievements. Discuss how these civilizations adapted to their environments.

sample.question: What region includes Mexico and Central America where ancient civilizations developed?

truefalse.question: The Aztec capital Tenochtitlan was built on a lake.

multiplechoice.question: Which civilization was known for astronomy and calendar systems?

fillintheblank.question: The capital city of the Aztec Empire was called ________.
